extendedInfo.description: EventPilot Plus mobile conference app for OLN 2011, a venue for Ohio Higher Education institutions to share best practices for using technology in the general areas of Student Services and Teaching & Learning.Meeting app features include:â¢ Native Android app: No wifi connection required to access the conference program, schedule or animated maps.â¢ Now: Stay informed about hot issues, program changes, your upcoming sessions, Twitter feeds and organizer messages. â¢ Contact Sharing: Easily share contact card information via QR or Bump technology.â¢ Program: Browse the entire event program to build your personal schedule, take notes, rate sessions or speakers and more. â¢ Slides: Access and tweet presentation slides. Take notes and email them as part of your trip report for reference. â¢ Twitter, Exhibitors, Maps, local entertainment and restaurant information, and much more.
